subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Sidney Crosby scored a goal, assisted on two by Evgeni Malkin, and dropped the gloves to spur the Penguins to a  shootout victory over the host Bruins.
snippet: Sidney Crosby scored a goal, assisted on two by Evgeni Malkin, and dropped the gloves to spur the Penguins to a  shootout victory over the host Bruins.
